text: Francesco Paolo Fulci (19 March 1931 â€“ 21 January 2022) was an Italian politician. He was born in Messina, Italy. Fulci was the Italian Ambassador to the United Nations between 1993 until 1999 during the Oscar Luigi Scalfaro presidency. Fulci died on 21 January 2022 at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors to the United Nations Category:Politicians from Sicily Category:People from Messina
title: Francesco Paolo Fulci
